title: PIA announces guidelines for passengers travelling to UAE
content:
KARACHI, Oct 15 (APP):Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) has announced new guidelines for travelers intending to travel to United Arab Emirates (UAE) on visit visa.
As per new UAE rules, passengers traveling to UAE must possess UAE currency, a return ticket and confirmed hotel booking and or local address of stay, said a spokesperson of the PIA on Thursday.
Passengers travelling to UAE will have to show that they are in possession of at least 2,000 Durhams.
In addition to the show money, a return ticket and a confirmed hotel booking or local stay address is now also a pre-requisite to travel.
All PIA Passengers are requested to ensure that these pre requisites are available with them and will be inquired upon at airports in Pakistan as well as UAE.
